short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🚀 Experience seamless real-time translation as you type.
short.zh_CN: 🚀 实时翻译你在消息输入框中输入的内容

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Every word you type in the input box is translated in real time, making cross-language communication a breeze!"
long.zh_CN: “实时翻译您在输入框中的每一个字，让跨语言交流变得轻而易举！”
